TopicTitle: Mining The Mun series with Mission control (you guys)

Articles.Content:
Mining the Mun series You Guys are also in Control

Ok so a revamp of my series mining on the Mun on Youtube,

I asked my viewers should we start a new series of continue with this one they said continue so we will but with changes I will do missions voted by you guys in my Youtube comments or here in Forum (Heart of our community) you can suggest a mission or vote on mission that was suggested, how voting works at the moment hasent been determined but we will see what happens.

Ok this title says mining the Mun while we will continue with that I want to also go further, someone has already suggested making an asteroid base, and going to every body in the Kerbin system.

So we will need long term goals and maybe short term goals let me know what you think are you interested, have you any ideas?

Note save file is from V1.0.2 game works in V1.0.4 but when KSP V1.1 is out save file may break then we can start afresh maybe in career as we are in sandbox at the moment.

Here is a video with me rambling on about it.
